markdown: Files that start with future dates should not be displayed unless using the `post` view with the post slug. eg. `http://app.lvh.me:4242/#post?s=_drafts_should_not_be_displayed`. This allows you to review/share drafts and/or future posts without displaying them in any of the list views.
html: Files that start with future dates should not be displayed unless using the post view with the post slug. eg. http://app.lvh.me:4242/#post?s=_drafts_should_not_be_displayed. This allows you to review/share drafts and/or future posts without displaying them in any of the list views.
